Description: Concave lip sherd, thickened at rim, of Attic black glaze pottery cup, probably band-cup; fine orange clay; interior; reserved band at rim, glazed black below; exterior: glazed black; inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Gardner 1888 / Naukratis II (p. 66, no. 806b, pl. XXI) (The text is combined with that on 1888,0601.204.)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.2.19)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1460)
